programme.title: Larry et son nombril
programme.sub-title: S11 E6 Larry vs. la femme demi-portion

programme.title: Le dernier gang
programme.desc: Au milieu des années 1970, Simon et ses copains, tous nés à Belleville, à Paris, dévalisent au culot de modestes agences bancaires. Quelques ratés et succès plus tard, ils basculent dans le grand banditisme et se font connaître sous le nom du Gang des postiches. C'est lors d'un braquage que Simon remarque Julie, dont il tombe amoureux. Eprise également, cette dernière accepte de partager sa vie.

programme.title: Madame Claude
programme.desc: A Paris, à la fin des années 1960, Fernande Grudet est à la tête d'une maison close très réputée. Plus connue sous le pseudonyme de Madame Claude, elle dirige avec rigueur et fermeté son établissement, discret mais fréquenté par des personnalités, des policiers et parfois même des politiques. Elle applique la même fermeté quand elle choisit ses nouvelles prostituées. Parmi ses nouvelle recrues, une jeune femme se distingue nettement : Sidonie, venue de la bonne société, dotée d'un bon carnet d'adresse et d'une forte personnalité, séduit rapidement Madame Claude.

programme.title: On verra bien si on se noie
programme.desc: Dans un petit village perdu, trois adolescents désoeuvrés décident de prendre leur vie en mains.

programme.title: Ramdam
programme.desc: Amine, brillant professeur d'histoire des civilisations, à Bordeaux, est courtisé par une université de Boston. Mais avant de partir aux Etats-Unis avec sa femme et ses enfants, il veut régler la vente d'une maison de famille à Saint-Marsain, village où réside son papa Rachid, président du club de rugby local. Les deux hommes ont des relations conflictuelles. Amine est furieux lorsqu'il découvre que son père a acheté les murs de la petite mosquée afin de transformer le lieu en discothèque pour fêter les fins de match.

programme.title: Mike
programme.desc: Mike va ses chez ses parents chercher des preuves pour démontrer qu'il n'a pas plagié Sinclair. Il vit un début d'histoire avec Claire, la fille de son ancien professeur de musique et gagne son procès contre Sinclair..

programme.title: Mike
programme.desc: Mike achète une guitare à 97 000 euros. Philippe Katerine la massacre après avoir chanté en duo avec Mike un morceau intitulé "La Bifle". Mike, qui vit une histoire sérieuse avec Claire, passe la nuit avec Caro..

programme.title: Mike
programme.desc: Mike doit assumer sa double histoire avec Claire et Caroline. Il a la mauvaise idée de les inviter toutes les deux à dîner à la même heure dans le même restaurant..

programme.title: Mike
programme.desc: Serge devient le nouveau manager de Mike. Liv dévoile à tout le monde que Caro et Mike sont de nouveau ensemble. Juliette finit par frapper Mike. Liv fait une fugue..

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: En décembre 1992, Mona Juul, employée au ministère des affaires étrangères norvégiennes, et son mari Terje Rod-Larsen, directeur du think tank Fafo, constatent les échecs successifs des négociation menées par des officiels israéliens et palestiniens pour trouver un accord de paix. Devant la lourdeurs des dispositifs officiel, le couple décide d'organiser une rencontre clandestine entre représentants des deux camps. Alors que Terje est au Moyen-Orient pour parler avec Yossi Beilin, ministre des affaires étrangères israélien, Mona se rend à Londres pour rencontrer Ahmed Qurei, ministre des finances de l'OLP.

programme.title: Ava
programme.desc: Ava, 13 ans, passe des vacances avec sa mère, Maud, et sa petite soeur, Inès, dans l'Ouest de la France au bord de la mer. C'est sur une plage qu'elle croise pour la première fois Juan, un jeune homme en fuite accompagné d'un grand chien noir, aux prises avec la police. Le lendemain, au cours d'un rendez-vous chez un ophtalmologiste, l'adolescente apprend qu'elle va progressivement perdre la vue. Un peu plus tard, elle suit Juan, qui est interpellé par un policier dans une supérette. Ava en profite pour partir avec son chien, qu'elle baptise Loupo.

programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Dans l'Ohio, Curtis LaForche vit modestement avec sa femme Samantha et leur petite fille sourde, Hannah. Fragile psychologiquement, Curtis est perturbé par des visions apocalyptiques. Persuadé de l'imminence d'un cataclysme, il s'est mis en tête de construire un abri contre les tempêtes dans le jardin. Même s'il consulte un psychologue, Samantha se fait du souci pour lui, d'autant qu'il engage beaucoup de frais pour réaliser son œuvre.

programme.title: La Cordillère des songes
programme.desc: Alors qu'il survole en avion la Cordillère des Andes, le cinéaste Patricio Guzman, exilé depuis quarante ans lors de la dictature militaire, se souvient de sa ville de naissance, Santiago. Il repense également au rapport que les chiliens entretiennent avec la chaîne de montagnes, qu'ils aperçoivent quotidiennement représentée sur une fresque lorsqu'ils prennent le métro. Il évoque le sujet avec son ami à l'origine de cette fresque, Guillermo Munoz Vera. Alors que Guillermo, exilé comme lui, vit en Espagne, Guzman, lui, vit en France. Les deux hommes s'interrogent sur leur rapport à ce lieu et à l'histoire de leur pays.

programme.title: Souvenir d'une après-midi d'été
programme.desc: C'est l'été à Corte, il fait chaud. Pour passer l'après-midi, Marie, Lucas et Ghujvanni traînent à la rivière. Ils remarquent qu'un touriste dort pas très loin et se mettent en tête de lui voler son portefeuille.

programme.title: Narco
programme.desc: Gustave Klopp, surnommé "Gus", s'endort n'importe où et n'importe quand. Un handicap qui l'empêche de travailler. Son épouse Pam, qui tient un institut de beauté, ne supporte plus de le voir traîner avec son meilleur ami Lenny Bar. Gus décide alors d'entamer une thérapie de groupe. Son psy Samuel Pupkin découvre alors que Gus fait des rêves incroyables où il devient un superhéros invincible et vengeur.

programme.title: Succession

programme.title: Steak
programme.desc: Dans un pays imaginaire, en 2016, Georges retrouve son ami Blaise après sept ans de séparation. Les codes gestuels et les critères de beauté ont changé depuis leur dernière rencontre. On ne dit plus bonjour mais "bottine" et les jeunes se font refaire le visage, à l'instar des Chivers, une bande de minets très en vue. Georges décide de recourir à la chirurgie esthétique pour devenir l'un des leurs.

programme.title: Billie: In Search of Billie Holiday
programme.desc: Au petit matin du 6 février 1978, le corps d'une jeune journaliste, Linda Lipnack Kuehl, a été découvert dans les rues de Washington D.C. La jeune femme avait consacré les dix dernières années de sa vie à retracer la véritable histoire de la chanteuse Billie Holiday. Dans ce cadre, elle avait enregistré des centaines d'heures d'interviews avec ses proches. Le livre n'a jamais été terminé et les bandes sont longtemps restées inutilisées. James Erskine est parvenu à les récupérer et a décidé de les utiliser comme support à un film sur la chanteuse. Outre la voix de Billie Holiday, on entend donc celles, notamment, de Count Basie, Louis Armstrong ou encore Tony Bennett.

programme.title: Austin Powers
programme.desc: En 1967, à Londres, Austin Powers est un photographe de mode adulé des femmes et jalousé des hommes. Plus discrètement, il est aussi le meilleur agent secret au service de Sa Majesté. Un soir, son ennemi juré, le diabolique docteur Denfer, parvient à lui échapper à bord d'une fusée spatiale et ne trouve rien de mieux à faire que de se congeler. Son but ? Revenir terroriser le monde trente ans plus tard. Austin Powers décide d'en faire de même. En 1997, les deux adversaires reviennent à la vie et s'affrontent à nouveau dans un monde qui a beaucoup changé.

programme.title: L'ivresse du pouvoir
programme.desc: Jeanne Charmant-Killman, juge à Paris, instruit une délicate affaire touchant aux milieux politiques et industriels. D'emblée, elle fait incarcérer pour détournement de fonds Michel Humeau, le président d'un puissant groupe industriel public qu’elle commence à interroger avec acharnement. Comme les autres personnes impliquées, Humeau reste muet. Jeanne se voit adjoindre une seconde magistrate avec qui elle travaille en bonne intelligence. Bientôt, les pressions pour la stopper vont s'intensifiant. Jeanne, incorruptible, se sent de plus en plus menacée.

programme.title: Contre-enquête
programme.desc: Hélène Villon, journaliste d'investigation pour le journal « La République », reçoit un message sur son portable de Kevin Lannier. Ce militaire qu'elle avait interviewé à son retour d’Afghanistan dit vouloir lui parler rapidement. Mais quand elle arrive chez lui, il est trop tard. Le jeune homme a été retrouvé mort au pied de son immeuble. Il a chuté du toit. Alors que la police penche pour la thèse du suicide, Hélène, qui connaissait Kevin, décide de mener sa propre enquête. Lors des funérailles, elle aborde la petite amie de Kevin.

programme.title: Le métis de Dieu
programme.desc: En 1979, le pape Jean-Paul II nomme le prêtre parisien Jean-Marie Lustiger, âgé de 53 ans, évêque d'Orléans. Son ascension est fulgurante : quatre ans plus tard, il devient cardinal et conseiller du Saint-Père. Né Juif et converti au catholicisme à l'âge de 14 ans, celui-ci ne pensait jamais voir les portes de l'épiscopat français s'ouvrir à lui.

programme.title: Shaun le mouton, le film
programme.desc: Shaun, un jeune mouton, grandit dans une petite ferme tenue par un éleveur aussi sympathique que myope. Mais, les journées puis les années passent, un peu répétitives et Shaun rêve de changer d'air. Avec d'autres animaux, le mouton organise un plan d'évasion. Après avoir détourné, avec l'aide précieuse du canard, l'attention de Blitzer, le chien de berger, Shaun et les autres moutons parviennent à endormir le fermier. Mais leur plan dérape et la caravane dans laquelle le fermier est endormi dévale la route. Blitzer tente alors de la rattraper. Peu de temps après, les moutons, livrés à eux-mêmes, comprennent qu'ils ont besoin du fermier. Shaun part en ville pour le retrouver.

programme.title: Un heureux événement
programme.desc: Etudiante en philosophie, Barbara Dray fait la connaissance de Nicolas Malle, qui travaille dans un vidéoclub. Il parvient à la séduire et ils s'installent ensemble. Lors de vacances, Nicolas convainc Barbara de faire un bébé. Un jour, la jeune femme annonce à Nicolas qu'elle est enceinte. Pendant sa grossesse, Barbara passe par tous les états. Et vient enfin le jour de l'accouchement, qui se déroule sans encombre. Mais c'est le début d'une véritable détresse pour Barbara, qui ne parvient pas à se faire à cette nouvelle vie.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 On ne choisit pas sa famille

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Maman, 12 appels manqués, 6 mémos, 3 textos

programme.title: Tais-toi !
programme.desc: Du fond de son cachot, Ruby, un cerveau du grand banditisme, ne songe qu'à se venger de son ancien patron, un truand qui a fait sauvagement abattre la femme qu'il aimait. Cet individu au caractère fort prépare méticuleusement son évasion. Mais son compagnon de cellule Quentin, un petit braqueur de banques, stupide et gentiment illuminé, s'est mis en tête de se faire la belle avec lui. Il espère même de devenir l'ami de Ruby.

programme.title: Argo
programme.desc: En 1979, lors de la prise de l'ambassade américaine à Téhéran par les révolutionnaires iraniens, soixante Américains sont pris en otage. Mais, au beau lieu du chaos, six employés parviennent à s'échapper. Ils se réfugient au domicile de l'ambassadeur canadien. Tony Mendez, agent de la CIA spécialiste de l'exfiltration, tente de trouver un plan pour les sauver. Il a l'idée de faire passer les employés pour des techniciens de cinéma venus en repérage en Iran pour tourner un film de science-fiction. Ce thriller dramatique est inspiré de faits vécus.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: Ma vie en l'air
programme.desc: Yann, trentenaire célibataire et instructeur dans une compagnie aérienne, a une peur panique de l'avion depuis que sa mère est morte au cours d'un vol, en le mettant au monde. Traînant cette phobie comme un fardeau, il multiplie depuis les échecs sentimentaux en compagnie de Ludo, son meilleur ami. Mais l'existence de Yann va bientôt basculer avec l'arrivée d'Alice, sa charmante nouvelle voisine.

programme.title: Dans Paris
programme.desc: Paul, 30 ans, rompt avec Anna et retourne quelques jours chez son père pour passer ce cap difficile. Son frère Jonathan, jeune homme insouciant, encore étudiant, tente de le sortir de sa déprime. Au cours d'une seule journée ponctuée de diverses rencontres, la famille, y compris la mère qui avait quitté son mari depuis plusieurs années, va se ressouder pour aider Paul à oublier ses pensées suicidaires.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: A Los Angeles, Lou Bloom, criminel qui vit d'expédients, découvre le travail des cameramen, à la recherche d'images explosives. Il s'en procure une et décide de se mettre à son compte. Ses moyens et son matériel sont très limités et ses premiers essais sont hasardeux mais Lou persévère. Il veut se faire une place dans le métier et impressionner Nina Romina, directrice de l'information de Channel 6, une chaine de télévision locale.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara, Evie, Roxanne, Amy et Birdie suivent les conseils de Rae pour mettre au point un plan solide pour s'emparer d'un collier qui vaut près de 16 millions de dollars.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Evie et ses comparses découvrent qu'elles ont finalement été doublées, un mystérieux voleur s'est emparé du collier. En outre, la police est sur leurs traces.

programme.title: Les revenants
programme.desc: Par un bel après-midi d'été, un événement extraordinaire se produit : plusieurs centaines de morts reviennent à la vie. Ils ont l'âge qu'ils avaient le jour de leurs obsèques, mais sans les stigmates d'une maladie. Pour Isham, le retour de son fils de 6 ans est le plus beau jour de sa vie. De son côté, Rachel voit ressurgir son mari Mathieu, décédé deux ans plus tôt dans un accident de la circulation. Pendant ce temps, les autorités tentent péniblement d'accueillir et de réintégrer ces milliers de revenants dans leurs familles. La tâche s'avère délicate.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Mexico est depuis six jours le théâtre d'enlèvements d'enfants de parents fortunés. L'industriel Samuel Ramos et sa femme Lisa engagent alors John Creasy, ancien agent de la CIA, pour assurer la protection rapprochée de Pita, leur fillette de 9 ans. Creasy tolère à peine cet enfant précoce, qui ne cesse de l'interroger sur sa vie. Mais, peu à peu, il apprend à l'apprécier. Pita est enlevée. Creasy se lance dans une vendetta.

programme.title: La fille oblique
programme.desc: Dans un village isolé de haute montagne, une tempête éclate. Une jeune femme, découvre alors un oiseau mystérieux qui la mène chez une sorcière.

programme.title: Parades
programme.desc: Face aux injustices du monde, Margot ne sait plus si l'avenir a un sens. Désabusée, ne croyant plus aux luttes politiques, elle veut s'en remettre au Dardu, une carpe légendaire sensée prédire l'avenir..

programme.title: Shrek 4 : il était une fin
programme.desc: Ayant regagné sa demeure avec femme et enfants, Shrek devrait être heureux. Mais il s'ennuie. Plus personne ne le craint. Lors de la fête d'anniversaire de ses enfants, les tensions s'accumulent pour l'ogre. Les trois petits cochons dévorent le gâteau. Shrek craque et finit par se mettre terriblement en colère. S'éloignant, il rencontre Tracassin, un sorcier qui lui propose un pacte. Contre une signature sur un contrat, il lui offre la possibilité de redevenir un véritable ogre. Shrek accepte… et se réveille dans un monde où plus personne ne le connaît.

programme.title: Les Trolls
programme.desc: Pendant longtemps, les trolls, de petites créatures colorées, vivaient heureux dans les arbres de la forêt où ils passaient leur temps à chanter, danser et à se faire des câlins. Jusqu'au jour où ils ont été découverts par les bergen, des monstres sinistres et géants, qui ont découvert qu'ils pouvaient être heureux en mangeant des trolls. Vingt ans ont passé et les trolls vivent cachés dans la forêt, sous la houlette du roi Peppy et de sa fille, la joyeuse princesse Poppy. Parmi eux, Branche, beaucoup moins joyeux, car il vit dans la crainte permanente que les bergen ne trouvent leur cachette.

programme.title: Fini de jouer
programme.desc: A 32 ans, Abe Applebaum n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il a été. Détective prodige dès l'âge de 13 ans, le jeune homme a connu une certaine notoriété avant de déchoir sévèrement. Désormais légèrement alcoolique, Abe, 32 ans, vit toujours dans la ville pavillonnaire de Willowbrook, sous le regard navré de ses parents et en est réduit à traiter des affaires mineures, souvent très mal rémunérées. Tout change quand Caroline, une de ses anciennes clientes, vient le voir pour l'aider à résoudre le meurtre de son petit ami, tué de 17 coups de couteaux.

programme.title: The Big Short : le casse du siècle
programme.desc: Dans les années 1970, le métier de banquier n'était pas particulièrement à la mode, jusqu'à l'intervention de Lewis Ranieri, qui a mis à la mode les obligations hypothécaires. Un frénésie s'est emparée de la finance pendant une trentaine d'années, jusqu'à un arrêt brutal avec la crise mondiale de 2008. Jared Vennett explique comment un analyste financier et des investisseurs de Wall Street ont senti le vent tourner et parié sur l'échec d'un système voué à s'effondrer.

programme.title: Le dernier Vermeer
programme.desc: Le 29 mai 1945, trois semaines après la chute du Reich d'Hitler, des soldats américains découvrent dans un train un important chargement d'oeuvres d'art. Parmi elles, «Le Christ et la Femme adultère», un tableau du peintre flamand Johannes Vermeer. Enrôlé par l'armée canadienne, le capitaine Joseph Piller, juif d'origine néerlandaise, est chargé de retrouver les propriétaires des oeuvres spoliées ainsi que ceux qui les ont volées. L'officier s'intéresse plus particulièrement au tableau de Vermeer, apparemment vendu à Hermann Göring par Han Van Meegeren, un marchand d'art néerlandais.

programme.title: Austin Powers
programme.desc: En 1967, à Londres, Austin Powers est un photographe de mode adulé des femmes et jalousé des hommes. Plus discrètement, il est aussi le meilleur agent secret au service de Sa Majesté. Un soir, son ennemi juré, le diabolique docteur Denfer, parvient à lui échapper à bord d'une fusée spatiale et ne trouve rien de mieux à faire que de se congeler. Son but ? Revenir terroriser le monde trente ans plus tard. Austin Powers décide d'en faire de même. En 1997, les deux adversaires reviennent à la vie et s'affrontent à nouveau dans un monde qui a beaucoup changé.

programme.title: Rencontre à Hampstead Park
programme.desc: Emily Walters, une américaine, tient une petite boutique de vêtements à Hampstead Heath, un quartier bourgeois de Londres. Malgré les tentatives répétées de ses amies de lui trouver un nouveaux compagnon, la sexagénaire vit toujours seule depuis la mort de son mari Charles, un personnage infidèle qui la laissée endettée. Dans le même quartier, Donald Horner mène une existence bien différente, dans une petite cabane, vivant d'expédients. Mais celle-ci est menacée par l'arrivée d'un promoteur immobilier désireux de construire dans le quartier.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara, Evie, Roxanne, Amy et Birdie suivent les conseils de Rae pour mettre au point un plan solide pour s'emparer d'un collier qui vaut près de 16 millions de dollars.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Evie et ses comparses découvrent qu'elles ont finalement été doublées, un mystérieux voleur s'est emparé du collier. En outre, la police est sur leurs traces.

programme.title: Alex Rider
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 Bienvenue à Pointe Blanche

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S5 E4 Deux amants dans la nuit

programme.title: Miss Fisher enquête
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Le crime du Ballarat Express

A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1492179/","name":"Strike Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyNDk4ZTYtM2EzNC00MmU3LTg2MmQtYjdlMjA4ZmEwNzU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU5Njg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. programme.title: Everyday People
Everyday People
programme.desc:
Everyday People: Directed by Jim McKay. With Nathan De'Shon Myers, Jordan Gelber, Bridget Barkan, Stephen McKinley Henderson. The closing of a local restaurant concerns a number of employees who've dedicated their lives to the eatery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0365020/","name":"Everyday People","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWE2NWNjZjgtMmZmNS00YjVkLWEzMWEtMDhjZWRlNWM5MDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The closing of a local restaurant concerns a number of employees who've dedicated their lives to the eatery.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0365020/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chron"},"dateCreated":"2004-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good Character-Driven Writing","reviewBody":"This is an ensemble story of the employees of a diner about ready to be closed. The reactions of the people are varied as are their individual stories. That's what makes this movie. I was interested in all of the people, even if I didn't completely understand their motivations and reactions. This is an exceptionally well-written story and well worth the time to watch it.

I enjoyed this movie, but the direction and pacing were slow. The editing contained a few too much stock footage. While a bit slow, the characters maintained my interest in the movie overall.

I like movies that aren't scripted "tight". We don't know all of the choices that all of the characters make in their lives after the credits roll. While that is a turn off to those weaned on Hollywood movies, I find that adds to the intrigue of a movie.

If you like character-driven movies as I do, this one is any enjoyable way to spend 90 minute. (Rating 8/10)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1188,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-01-12","keywords":"restaurant,vomiting,kitchen,single mother,african american","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1772829/","name":"Nathan De'Shon Myers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312217/","name":"Jordan Gelber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054769/","name":"Bridget Barkan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570995/","name":"Jim McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049706/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065292/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116516/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570995/","name":"Jim McKay"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cars
The Wire
The Wire
programme.sub-title: S4 E7 S4 E7 Was du nicht willst, das man dir tut..
programme.desc:
Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0317219, Title: Cars, --- Description: Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman","dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"],"duration":"PT1H57M"</script><metacontent="

programme.sub-title: S1 E11 S1 E11 Begräbnis aus Liebe
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"plumberguy66","dateCreated":"2002-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Free Therapy","reviewBody":"As I was reading through the comments about Six Feet Under I was struck by how many people expressed how this series made them FEEL. And how many people admitted to tearing up or even crying while watching the show. I admit I have done the same.

From the very beginning no before that From the moment I heard that Six Feet Under was created by Alan Ball, I knew I would like this show. I figured how could the maker of American Beauty go wrong? Boy am I glad I figured that.

To some degree I can relate to all of the characters on the show. And that speaks volumes because all of the characters on the show are kinda messed up in the head. And that is what I think speaks to so many people. I mean before Donahue was the most popular show on TV, I don't think most Americans even knew the word dysfunctional' as applied to the family unit. Then it seemed a badge of honor to wear. And it was ok to go about telling people that you are from a dysfunctional family just to be in'. Now after all this time and openness about our dysfunction, we begin to see how very much alike we all are. And that I feel is one of the binding elements of the watchers to this program. We sit each week and watch, basically, a part of ourselves work through personal issues, prejudices and shortcomings. Not always pretty, not always successfully but always openly, to us, the viewers. For me, to watch these characters struggle through some of their problems (which usually make mine look like a day at the beach) and let us come along with them to learn about their weaknesses and fallibilities and humanness is a lot like therapy for me. And in the end it only costs the subscription rate for HBO (no, I don't work for them).

I have never been that attached to the boob-tube (my father's word for the television) before. I have never had a reason to be. The programs that where on never more that mildly held my attention until now. I HATE commercials, I think they speak down to the public. So now I have no excuses and for that I am grateful.

Bottom line: I'm looking forward to the next few sessions uhm I mean seasons. That's my take, what's yours?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128099,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis","dateCreated":"2009-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Show Does The Impossible","reviewBody":"When using superlatives with this show it is totally fair. This show does something all other movies, shows, etc cannot do: it can safely apply any genre and still function as a deep and very entertaining show. As everybody episode goes by the show only becomes more addictive. It taps into almost every aspect of life. Every emotion is shown; love, hate, forgiveness, triumph and the list goes on and on. In fact this show depicts life the most realistically. The strangeness and peculiarity of the many themes perfectly displays the confusion in life and how it affects us. The show displays confusion in the clearest way making it almost impossible not to some how relate to the characters in the show. Not to mention also the series ends on one finest note you will ever see not just satisfying the viewer but taking the show to a level far and above anything else I have ever seen before. This show does the impossible twice over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.title: Treme

programme.sub-title: S1 E1 S1 E1 Do You Know What It Means
programme.desc:
Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bilko-1"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A major artistic achievement from David Simon","reviewBody":"My first impression, from watching episode one, was that the writing did not have the flow of "The Wire" it was trying too hard to register the many characters and to quickly tick off the various "types" that make up New Orleans society. Bunk and Freeman were too firmly placed in my memory for me to make the leap to Antoine and Albert. As for the Steve Zahn character, I instantly took a dislike to him and found him unrealistic in the extreme.

By the time we had reached the scene with the Big Chief emerging from the dark, I had become hooked. The characters started to make sense. The generous helping of musical scenes produced what must be the finest portrayal of live music and musicians I have ever seen. I could not wait to catch episode two.

I have now watched the first two episodes twice and all my first impressions have been blown away. Once you get to know the characters and can watch their introduction again, things start to make sense. Steve Zahn? What a brilliant comic creation. Just watch the intro to episode two, his creeping around Elvis Costello, his first day on the job. Absolutely first rate, The shocking introduction of violence, suddenly alters ones perceptions of a major character. Bunk, still lingers in the memory, but Antoine's blowing is going to change all that. I was not familiar with Khandi Alexander, but am now a major fan. Her performance is charismatic in the extreme.

I know that this series is not going to be to everyone's liking, but then neither is Shakespeare or Dickens. However, for those who enjoy a multi-faceted piece of work that can examine society in minute detail whilst never failing to entertain, this will surely rank as a major piece of American art.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,radio station,alternative music","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"}}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Dustin Hoffman, Dennis Farina, John Ortiz, Richard Kind, Kevin Dunn

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1578887, Title: Luck, --- Description: Luck: Created by David Milch. With Dustin Hoffman, Dennis Farina, John Ortiz, Richard Kind. A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1578887/","name":"Luck","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5MDUyMDY0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTAyMTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1578887/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"SentientMeat","dateCreated":"2012-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"All-stars on all sides transport us to an exciting, sad world in style.","reviewBody":"LUCK is fast and stylish. Michael Mann is exec. producer of LUCK and director of the first episode. Mann is the writer/director of "Heat" and LUCK has the same pace and style. 

There is plenty of insider chatter here. The kind of dialogue that is second nature to the people associated with horse racing but that leaves the rest of us a bit dizzy. LUCK is the clash of very different characters and it gives Mann as much contrast as the cinematography that has become his signature. Washed up gamblers, hungry employee's, wealthy owners and the people one step from financial ruin or rejuvenation are painted in different colors of neon or grays as success and/or slime in all its forms contrast with the strength, beauty and earthiness of the central characters: Horses, fodder for the justification of so much excitement and sadness.

LUCK is a convergence of who's who at Santa Anita. I'm grateful that so many deserving thespians wanted in on this project. I'm sure they know much about their peers but their on-screen "history" with each other is believable. Can the script justify the talent? So far, yes. The writing seems to have as much good teeth as its all-star cast - pay attention and hold on.

This premier reminds me of "Mad Men" on AMC, a channel I ALSO got for free for the first 3 (enjoyable) episodes. I did not bite on AMC but LUCK is making a good argument for HBO.

I'm certain the language will soak in with the rest of the story but I have the inside on "bug", as the agent calls the young Jockey. "Bug" is a moniker used for substitute jockey's. Any rookie that replaces an expected rider is noted on a racing program with an asterisk and an asterisk looks like a bug (the definition is courtesy of David Milch).","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5698,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2012-01-29","keywords":"horse race,horse trainer,organized crime,gambling,racetrack","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000163/","name":"Dustin Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001199/","name":"Dennis Farina","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651159/","name":"John Ortiz"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035930/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586965/","name":"David Milch"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Luck","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3881213465","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A promo for the new HBO series centered around characters tied to the same horse-racing track. "</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 12967950, Title: Agents of Chaos, --- Description: Agents of Chaos: With Alex Gibney, John Podesta, Margarita Simonyan, Andrew McCabe. Was there Russian interference in the 2016 election? This two-part documentary directed by Emmy(R) and Academy Award(R) Winner Alex Gibney is a product of years of reporting on that disturbing question. With never-before-seen footage inside Russian troll farms, and videos unearthed from the Russian deep web, the film digs into the sophisticated plans to undermine democracy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt12967950/","name":"Agents of Chaos","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDFmMTE5OWMtZjI2Mi00MDM2LWI3YTctMzI4NzI0MTUxYmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Was there Russian interference in the 2016 election? Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman","dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion)

programme.sub-title: S2 E1 S2 E1 Nichts als Blut
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"plumberguy66","dateCreated":"2002-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Free Therapy","reviewBody":"As I was reading through the comments about Six Feet Under I was struck by how many people expressed how this series made them FEEL. And how many people admitted to tearing up or even crying while watching the show. I admit I have done the same.

From the very beginning no before that From the moment I heard that Six Feet Under was created by Alan Ball, I knew I would like this show. I figured how could the maker of American Beauty go wrong? Boy am I glad I figured that.

To some degree I can relate to all of the characters on the show. And that speaks volumes because all of the characters on the show are kinda messed up in the head. And that is what I think speaks to so many people. I mean before Donahue was the most popular show on TV, I don't think most Americans even knew the word dysfunctional' as applied to the family unit. Then it seemed a badge of honor to wear. And it was ok to go about telling people that you are from a dysfunctional family just to be in'. Now after all this time and openness about our dysfunction, we begin to see how very much alike we all are. And that I feel is one of the binding elements of the watchers to this program. We sit each week and watch, basically, a part of ourselves work through personal issues, prejudices and shortcomings. Not always pretty, not always successfully but always openly, to us, the viewers. For me, to watch these characters struggle through some of their problems (which usually make mine look like a day at the beach) and let us come along with them to learn about their weaknesses and fallibilities and humanness is a lot like therapy for me. And in the end it only costs the subscription rate for HBO (no, I don't work for them).

I have never been that attached to the boob-tube (my father's word for the television) before. I have never had a reason to be. The programs that where on never more that mildly held my attention until now. I HATE commercials, I think they speak down to the public. So now I have no excuses and for that I am grateful.

Bottom line: I'm looking forward to the next few sessions uhm I mean seasons. That's my take, what's yours?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128099,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bilko-1"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A major artistic achievement from David Simon","reviewBody":"My first impression, from watching episode one, was that the writing did not have the flow of "The Wire" it was trying too hard to register the many characters and to quickly tick off the various "types" that make up New Orleans society. Bunk and Freeman were too firmly placed in my memory for me to make the leap to Antoine and Albert. As for the Steve Zahn character, I instantly took a dislike to him and found him unrealistic in the extreme.

By the time we had reached the scene with the Big Chief emerging from the dark, I had become hooked. The characters started to make sense. The generous helping of musical scenes produced what must be the finest portrayal of live music and musicians I have ever seen. I could not wait to catch episode two.

I have now watched the first two episodes twice and all my first impressions have been blown away. Once you get to know the characters and can watch their introduction again, things start to make sense. Steve Zahn? What a brilliant comic creation. Just watch the intro to episode two, his creeping around Elvis Costello, his first day on the job. Absolutely first rate, The shocking introduction of violence, suddenly alters ones perceptions of a major character. Bunk, still lingers in the memory, but Antoine's blowing is going to change all that. I was not familiar with Khandi Alexander, but am now a major fan. Her performance is charismatic in the extreme.

I know that this series is not going to be to everyone's liking, but then neither is Shakespeare or Dickens. However, for those who enjoy a multi-faceted piece of work that can examine society in minute detail whilst never failing to entertain, this will surely rank as a major piece of American art.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,radio station,alternative music","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nur Gott kann mich richten
Nur Gott kann mich richten
programme.desc:
Nur Gott kann mich richten: Directed by Özgür Yildirim. With Neil Malik Abdullah, Kai Ivo Baulitz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Zejhun Demirov. After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, and Ricky could use the money to set up his new life. Ricky hesitates at first but then agrees. Complications arise as soon as some preparations start. Things kept going out in awry, especially as a form of hardup policewoman Diana." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6175764/","name":"Nur Gott kann mich richten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjExZjMyMTItNWVjYy00M2U4LTllZTAtYzQwNDdkZmVkNDBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA3Njg4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6175764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DimitrisPassas-TapTheLine"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Guns, robberies and 25 kilos of heroin in today's Frankfurt.","reviewBody":"This is a fabulous German production, shot in Frankfurt, with a plot that entails the underground people of drug trafficking, two brothers who were in prison for a botched robbery that resulted in the serious injury of two people, and a young female police officer, being in a desperate need for money in order to help her sick daughter.

Moritz Bleibtreu, one of the best contemporary German thespians, plays the role of Ricky, a young man who is totally immersed in the outlaw lifestyle and Edin Hasanovic is his brother, Rafa who, even though he takes part in his brother's shady dealings and endeavors, has a good heart and is gonna soon be a father to a baby. When the two siblings are stopped by the police with their car full of 25 kilos of stolen heroin, they will have to leave the drugs behind and Diana (Birgit Minichmayr) will seize the opportunity to make some easy money by selling the stuff to local dealers.

I will not reveal anything more about the plot as it takes some nasty twists and turns that will definitely keep you on the edge of your seat, as the level of suspense is held in high standards throughout the movie's running time. The director, Özgür Yildirim , does a remarkable job in handling the camera in the action scenes which are all wonderfully captured. The performances by the three protagonists are outstanding, proving that Germany is not dead as far as the production of quality silver screen movies is concerned. In a way, the movie reminded me the "Ardennes" (2015), a Belgian crime film, also featuring two delinquent brothers as protagonists. The family drama is intense in "Only God Can Judge Me" too and the finale is both strong and sad for the main characters.

If you are a fan of Euro-Crime films, you should check this one out and you are bound to be thoroughly entertained.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1938,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-01-25","keywords":"frankfurt germany,botched robbery,jail,revenge,strong female character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918510873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2494529/","name":"Neil Malik Abdullah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062049/","name":"Kai Ivo Baulitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001953/","name":"Moritz Bleibtreu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0612398/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="
